title: 2014-10-21.The Anthony Cumia Show
description: Episode 045: Jim Florentine sits in studio with Ant to talk about old school strip clubs, the Portly Pepperpot, Monica Lewinsky, Ant being shunned from the SiriusXM building, and the way people tweet because of the snowball effect it can have. They discuss people's reaction to racial humor, comic lives and dying too young, we see an old clip of a Bill Burr interview and hear from new sponsor ADailyMinute.com. Ant talks about drinking on-air back in the day, Jim talks about his recent appearances on O&J and his Ozzy's Boneyard show, and they muse over new music and dating younger girls. After a few calls, Ant explains his theory on relationships, they go through a red flag list when it comes to crazy girls, Florentine tells us some stories about when he was roommates with Jim Norton, they swap stories about bed hopping chicks, and a bonus time phone call is made to Bobo's mom regarding his booking on the show tomorrow
